description:
Currently os-api extensions can only be disabled by choosing which ones to enable. E.g.:

    osapi_compute_extension = nova.api.openstack.compute.contrib.select_extensions
    osapi_compute_ext_list = <all enabled extensions listed here>

With nearly a hundred extensions, though, disabling a single extension is absurdly onerous.

It should be possible to blacklist extensions as well, so that an administrator doesn't need to list all but one (or all but a handful) of extensions just to disable an extension.
title: Blacklist os-api extensions

comments.content:
Currently os-api extensions can only be disabled by choosing which ones to enable. E.g.:

    osapi_compute_extension = nova.api.openstack.compute.contrib.select_extensions
    osapi_compute_ext_list = <all enabled extensions listed here>

With nearly a hundred extensions, though, disabling a single extension is absurdly onerous.

It should be possible to blacklist extensions as well, so that an administrator doesn't need to list all but one (or all but a handful) of extensions just to disable an extension.
